Ancestry-Hobgoblin -- Male Warrenbred Hobgoblin Fighter
Strength: +0 Dexterity: +3 Constitution: +3 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: -1 Charisma: +2
Background: Prisoner Deity: Nethys
Experience: 597/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 15 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 5/10
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -10 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
War Conditioning (Climb): Has a 20' climb Speed
War Conditioning (Swim): Has a 20' swim Speed

Alchemical Scholar: Knows +1 common alchemical formulas
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Fell Rider: Animal companion is trained in Intimidation and can give Aid on Demoralize attempts
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command An Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Perception: +4 (wisdom; expert)

Arcana: +5 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +5 (charisma; trained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +0 (strength; trained) Lizardfolk Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +3 (dexterity; trained)

Additional Lore (Hobgoblin Lore): Skill Trained (Hobgoblin Lore)
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Armor Skill Penalty: -3 strength and dexterity skills
Deity And Cause: Arcana
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 5 from any)
Hobgoblin Lore: Skill Trained (Athletics; Crafting)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Experienced Smuggler: Automatically gets at least 10 on Stealth rolls to conceal a small item
Expert Drill Sergeant: Following an Expert while exploring gives allies a +3 or +4 bonus on skills with expert or master proficiency
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 4 alchemical formulas
Group Coercion: Can use Intimidation to Coerce 5 targets
Runtboss Hobgoblin: Successes on Coercion checks vs. goblins are critical successes and critical failures are normal failures
Shortshanks Hobgoblin: Climbing does not inflict off-guard
Sneaky: +5 Sneak speed, and can Sneak between cover
Warmarch Hobgoblin: Normal failures to Subsist in wilderness locate enough poor fare to stay fed/Can Hustle twice as long as normal when exploring
Warrenbred Hobgoblin: Successes on Acrobatics to Squeeze are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 21 Armor Class: 19 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Splint Mail Shield: None Weapons: Capturing Spetum (+5 1d10 P; strength; expert); Heavy Crossbow (+8 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Scimitar (+5 1d6 S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Hobgoblin Weapons; Composite Longbow; Composite Shortbow; Glaive; Longbow; Longsword; Shortbow)
Agonizing Rebuke: Successful Demoralize inflicts 1d4 HP mental each rd for 1 min or until the target is more than 30' away or no longer frightened
Can't Fall Here: (R) Adjacent willing ally reduced to 0 Hit Points retains 1 Hit Point, suffers a wounded level, and gains 1 temporary Hit Point for 1 min once per day
Cantorian Rejuvenation: (2) Recovers 4d6 Hit Points and gains 10 temporary Hit Points for 1 min once per day
Cantorian Restoration: (R) R60' Restores 6d8+3 Hit Points to a dying creature once per day
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward the multiple attack penalty on failure
Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon hobgoblin weapons
Leech-Clip: (2) Successful Strike with a flail inflicts -10' Speed, or -15' Speed on a critical hit, for 1 rd
Pride In Arms: (R) Gives an ally who brings a foe to 0 HP temporary HP equal to their Constitution modifier until the end of their next turn
Rallying Cry: (2) 30' emanation gives allies 1 temporary Hit Point and an additional Step, Stride, or Strike each rd for 1 min once per day
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Recognize Ambush: (F) Draws a weapon during initiative
Remorseless Lash: Melee hits prevent reduction of a frightened condition until the beginning of the next turn
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Smokeworker Hobgoblin: Targeting a smoke-concealed creature requires no flat check
Squad Tactics: Adjacent foes within reach of 2 allies are off-guard vs. self
Warrenbred Hobgoblin: Reduces the flat check DC to target a concealed or hidden foe to 3 or 9
Save: Fortitude: +8 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +2 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Cantorian Reinforcement: Successes vs. disease or poison are critical successes
Resist Elf Magic: (R) +1 vs. the triggering magical effect, or +2 vs. an arcane effect
Smokeworker Hobgoblin: Has fire resistance 1
Stone Face: +1 vs. fear and +2 Will DC vs. Intimidation
Vigorous Health: Successful DC 17 flat check negates gaining the drained condition
